dr.math.interfaces
Interface ParametrizedOneVariableFunction

All Superinterfaces:
OneVariableFunction
public interface ParametrizedOneVariableFunction
extends OneVariableFunction

ParametrizedOneVariableFunction is an interface for mathematical functions of one variable depending on several parameters, that is functions of the form f(x;p), where p is a vector.

Author:
Didier H. Besset

valueAndGradient

double[] valueAndGradient(double x)
Evaluate the function and the gradient of the function with respect to the parameters.
